title: Figs with Goat Cheese Pecans and Bacon

content.eamr: ( ing-3 "3 slices bacon, cut in half" )

content.text: 1) Stuff fig halves with goat cheese.
3) Wrap each stuffed fig half with half a slice of bacon, securing with toothpicks.
4) Arrange on a medium baking sheet.
5) Broil 5 minutes, or until bacon is evenly brown and crisp and goat cheese is bubbly and lightly browned.
